original_title: I Thought the Earth Remembered Me
overview: A queer love story about a terminally ill woman who journeys back to the place where she once lived with the love of her life over thirty years ago. The place where she chooses to live out her last days and die on her own terms. Upon revisiting powerful memories from her past, she is given the courage and the closure she needs to finally accept her life as it was, as it is, and as it will be.
title: I Thought the Earth Remembered Me
